4bc8d78d675403bb8f466094.name: #4sqDay 2010
4bc8d78d675403bb8f466094.description: Happy foursquare day! (four squared = 4/16, get it?) Here's a toast to all of you for making foursquare so amazing and to the 150+ #4sqDay parties going on around the world!

4d3d99b53ec9a35d13d95281.name: Super Swarm
4d3d99b53ec9a35d13d95281.description: 50 person foursquare swarms are soooo 2009.  We upped it to 250 for the Super Swarm and you still nailed it.  Well played!

4bacbd17675403bbedb75894.name: Newbie
4bacbd17675403bbedb75894.description: Congrats on your first check-in! In foursquare, you earn badges for your best check-ins – like going to museums, staying out late, or working out at the gym ten times in a month. Have fun exploring!

4d27c7d355a8b60cf62cc7c0.name: Bender
4d27c7d355a8b60cf62cc7c0.description: That's 4+ nights in a row for you!

4bb169f2675403bb10045a94.name: Crunked
4bb169f2675403bb10045a94.description: That's 4+ stops in one night for you!

4bd8464a675403bbcc6e6594.name: Local
4bd8464a675403bbcc6e6594.description: You've been at the same place 3x in one week!

4c91810fae96a0937b5aa446.name: Super User
4c91810fae96a0937b5aa446.description: That's 30 check-ins in a month for you!

4d3e83bfa2e4b1f77c9cfb25.name: School Night
4d3e83bfa2e4b1f77c9cfb25.description: Checking in after 3am on a school night? Well done!

4da8ec368154abafc287cf1a.name: Far Far Away
4da8ec368154abafc287cf1a.description: Welcome to the world above 59th Street!

4d20bd4ff7a9a1431db72f9f.name: Brooklyn 4 Life
4d20bd4ff7a9a1431db72f9f.description: That's 25+ check-ins in Brooklyn for you!

4d0d77f47d28721ef839f920.name: Photogenic
4d0d77f47d28721ef839f920.description: You found 3 places with a photobooth!

4c116e02675403bbb27c7d94.name: Swarm
4c116e02675403bbb27c7d94.description: 50+ people are also checked in here - it's a foursquare flashmob!

4dbe3e4a0437955ec060aef9.name: Super Duper Swarm
4dbe3e4a0437955ec060aef9.description: That "Super Swarm" badge is for babies!  Welcome to the Super Duper Swarm Club - 500 people checked in at once!

4d431f3258e9b1f7c554e0ce.name: 9 to 5
4d431f3258e9b1f7c554e0ce.description: Looks like someone's filed 15 TPS reports in 30 days. Ummm... Yeeaahh... we're gonna need to go ahead and move you downstairs into Storage B.

4ccb7ded566aa093fe531bfd.name: Spooky Swarm
4ccb7ded566aa093fe531bfd.description: This Monster Mash is now swarming! I'd watch out if I were you...  cause this is Thriller! Thriller Night! And no one's going to save you from the beast about to strike!

4cd041dd6200b1f71e31d328.name: I Voted 2010
4cd041dd6200b1f71e31d328.description: ...and the home of the brave!  Thanks for voting!  Now visit elections.foursquare.com

4d1e994b6e8c3704cad3e89f.name: New Year's 2011
4d1e994b6e8c3704cad3e89f.description: Happy New Year!  Thanks for all your check-ins, tips, photos, comments and badge unlocks in 2010. Here's to a happy and healthy 2011 - and a hangover free tomorrow.

4da9b72b43a1128196e480b6.name: 4sqDay 2011
4da9b72b43a1128196e480b6.description: And we thought last year was huge! Happy 4/4^2 day! Thanks to all of you amazing people, for organizing over 1000 parties around the world for our little startup! We would give a speech, but we're just trying to hold back our tears.

venue.name: Sharon Dorram Color at Sally Hershberger

4c4f08667a0803bbb2202ab7.name: Player Please!
4c4f08667a0803bbb2202ab7.hint: Don't hate the player. Hate the game!

4c4f08667a0803bbba202ab7.name: Socialite
4c4f08667a0803bbba202ab7.hint: Go get seen at a scene a few times!

4c4f08667a0803bbb8202ab7.name: Douchebag
4c4f08667a0803bbb8202ab7.hint: Is that Drakkar Noir you smell? Follow your nose, until it gets broken!

4c4f08667a0803bbb9202ab7.name: Animal House
4c4f08667a0803bbb9202ab7.hint: Hanging out with a raucous college crowd?  If not, then you won't be unlocking this badge anytime soon!

4c4f08667a0803bbce202ab7.name: Ziggy's Wagon
4c4f08667a0803bbce202ab7.hint: mmmmm..... Meals on Wheels (and we don't mean the assisted living type)

4c4f08667a0803bbcf202ab7.name: Don't Stop Believin'
4c4f08667a0803bbcf202ab7.hint: Sure, you've got a great voice in the shower, who doesn't? Singing in public is the key to unlocking this badge!

4c4f08667a0803bbd0202ab7.name: Gym Rat
4c4f08667a0803bbd0202ab7.hint: If you want this badge you have to work for it - do another 10 reps and we'll talk!

4c4f08667a0803bbc3202ab7.name: Overshare
4c4f08667a0803bbc3202ab7.hint: Tweets and blogs aren't enough to satisfy your digital desire to share.  You're gonna need a thumb-massage after unlocking this badge.

4c4f08667a0803bbd2202ab7.name: Trainspotter
4c4f08667a0803bbd2202ab7.hint: Ditch your wheels and make BART your best friend.

4c4f08667a0803bbda202ab7.name: JetSetter
4c4f08667a0803bbda202ab7.hint: Getting the ol' pat-down by five different strangers is a small price to pay for this rare bird.

4c4f08667a0803bbdb202ab7.name: 16 Candles
4c4f08667a0803bbdb202ab7.hint: Good friends always remember birthdays. Great friends sing real loud!

4c4f08667a0803bbdc202ab7.name: Zoetrope
4c4f08667a0803bbdc202ab7.hint: Phone on silent? Soda? Popcorn? Check!  Now its time to see a ton of movies!

4c4f08667a0803bbdd202ab7.name: Pizzaiolo
4c4f08667a0803bbdd202ab7.hint: The path to this badge is paved with slices from many many ovens - not to mention 10 extra lbs.

4c4f08667a0803bbde202ab7.name: Jobs
4c4f08667a0803bbde202ab7.hint: Here's the silver lining to breaking your iPhone 3 times.

4c4f08667a0803bbdf202ab7.name: Warhol
4c4f08667a0803bbdf202ab7.hint: You may want to check into the decahedron period before unlocking this badge!

4c4f08667a0803bbe0202ab7.name: Babysitter
4c4f08667a0803bbe0202ab7.hint: If the monkey bars were an Olympic event, you'd be a Gold Medalist.

4c4f08667a0803bbe4202ab7.name: Super Mayor
4c4f08667a0803bbe4202ab7.hint: One badge to rule them all.

4c4f08667a0803bbe5202ab7.name: I'm on a boat!
4c4f08667a0803bbe5202ab7.hint: I can't even fathom how to unlock this deep sea treasure.

4c4f08677a0803bb4e212ab7.name: Dog's Best Friend
4c4f08677a0803bb4e212ab7.hint: "Bark Bark Woof!" Somebody wants to play!

4c7d1dd0978976b0c7cee939.name: Swimmies
4c7d1dd0978976b0c7cee939.hint: Only properly pruned hands can unlock this badge.

4c7d1deb978976b064cfe939.name: Great Outdoors
4c7d1deb978976b064cfe939.hint: Looks like someone could use some fresh air.

4cec5f0bf7ac8eecd229e51e.name: Ski Bum
4cec5f0bf7ac8eecd229e51e.hint: Get your skis shined up. Grab a stick of Juicy Fruit! The taste is gonna move ya!

4d0925ed304460fc7117da63.name: 7-10 Split
4d0925ed304460fc7117da63.hint: Hit the lanes and show us some XXX - and no, not that kind of XXX. Get your head out of the gutter!
